column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba! catered for our wedding reception. The food was so delicious that the guests are still talking about it
column2: and the staff was very professional
column4: helpful and prompt. But what truly stood out was Alison
column5: who was the event planner. She went above and beyond to provide any special request we had
column6: and was always quick to respond to all our questions. We truly appreciate all of her efforts in making our vision for the wedding become reality.
